EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Skills & Experience Survey
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.StepFwd_Associate_first_name_confirm__c},
Your Step Forward Skills Survey
The deadline has now passed and we are yet to receive your completed skills and experience survey.
This survey is really important as it lets us know more about you and we use it to make sure that we match you with the right interviews. Please complete the form below within 24 hours to let us know your interests and experience in relation to your pathways and remember to choose your favourite pathway.
Click here to complete your survey
(this link is personal to you so please do not forward this email to anyone else).
The survey takes 15 minutes and please note that we will not start matching you until it is complete.
If you have any questions do get in touch with the team. You can contact us on 0203 542 2404 and we are option 5.
All the best,
Step Forward
